Will accept other forms of net payment excluding livestock

Shipping is free of charge.
The remaining 5 cards will be offered at 10% off until MN ET Wednesday Oct 20 and then they will be returned to my vault.
Of note….The Stovall has a pretty tough SC 460 F 25 back
